issue.title: [C++] Add validation to ExecBatch
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18015](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18015). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It's easy to get an invalid `ExecBatch`, if only because its fields are public, but there is currently no way to validate it. See [discussion here](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14386#discussion_r993669256).
